import axios from 'axios'; import React, { useEffect, useState } from 'react' import { useParams } from 'react-router-dom' export default function UpdateClass() { const {id} = useParams(); const [classId, setClassId] = useState({ id: id, classname: '', grade: '', date: '', time: '', link: '' }) useEffect(() => { axios.get('http://localhost:8070/get/'+id,).then(res =>{ setClassId({...classId, classname: res.data.classname, grade: res.data.grade, date: res.data.date, time: res.data.time, link: res.data.link}) }) .catch(err => console.log(err)) },[]) return (




Update Class





) }
